document_data.name: Dark Wave
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dark Wave''' was a small group of [[holy slayer]]s that were operating out of [[Hawa]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: The Dark Wave served the [[Cult of Istishia|Cult of]] [[Istishia]], against their will. They carried out assassinations when ordered.
document_data.Base of Operations: Hawa, on the island of the [[Genie's Turban]] within the [[Corsair Domains]], served as the base for the Dark Wave.
document_data.Relationships: All members of the Dark Wave were under the influence of a [[ghul-kin]] named [[Faizah]] and her [[Waters of devotion]].
document_data.Members: The Dark Wave only had three members: [[Setara bint Aasim]], [[Shadha]], and [[Sahlah]].
